title: fresh lv30 / low bronze players, offering help in ranked / game / coaching
body:
Looking to coach and help people who are just starting out in ranked or are in bronze 5 but have less than 10-20 ranked games played ( give or take ) add me IGN : SNLPER , will provide further details when requested but main priority is to help players get hands on experience with the current meta and will answer any questions at the current time.

thanks, hope to hear from some of you!

replies.body: Is silver 2 ok because i dont play ranked alot but i need to improve i only have 20 ranked games.

yeah thats fine! just the fewer the games the more new the player would be , therefore greater the help but if you have 50  games played 100 ++ thats completely fine give us an add! im just offering myself out there for the more new players :)
What about those with nearly 200 ranked games in Bronze 5 & 4?
